relation: Stockton has many programs, such as movie nights, the gym, game room, and so on.
The food is pretty basic. There are some good places on campus and the dining hall varies on how good the food is.
Stockton rooms you with someone with many similar interests as you and you get along with very well.
The classes are very set. The material is set to make you learn, but it is not so tough as you will never pass.
Use ratemyprofessor.com when picking your teachers and classes.

The Richard Stockton College of New Jersey is a very good place to start your future. Not only do you gain an education, but you also gain many new friends from the students and the staff. The staff is very willing to help you with any problems you may face and continues to help you until you are comfortable with the material.
pageTitle: Stockton University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {383431=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 51321=With all the new building, if you are commuting be sure to come early, there is litterally no parking after 9:30 am., 31599=It's important to have good grades and SAT score in order to be eligible to receive financial aid in the very first year (currently, the Presidential Scholarship with an SAT Critical Writing and Math total score of at least 1400 and a rank in the top five percent of your class, Provost's Scholarship with 1250 and in the top ten percent, and the Dean's Scholarship with 1150 and in the top 15 percent; it's all on the website) as well as to review all of your major options once you're a student -- there are many fields of study available at Stockton, so it's good to check them all out before declaring your major(s) and/or minor(s). And once you've enrolled at Stockton, remember to join at least one or two clubs, organizations, or sports teams. :), 81359=Stockton is a great college to attend if your not quite sure what direction your headed in. It will help you explore many areas of study and you'll have a great time doing so. Recently in 2011, Stockton opened up a new campus center which is great to hang out in with friends to play games, study, relax and watch t.v., or get some food.}

textAfterTable: Colleen from Ringwood, NJ 12/20/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 5 out of 7 people found this review useful. 2 of 87 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Stockton College is a GREAT science school. It is also a good business school. I would also recommend Stockton for anyone who doesn't want to enter a huge college. Stockton is on the small side, and is very comfortable. It has changed my life, and I wouldn't want to be anywhere else. Tips for prospective students I would definitely recommend on going to the SOAR program the weekend before school starts. I met three of my best friends during that program. I would also recommend going to all the activities they have during the first week of school. It really helps you feel more comfortable in your new surroundings. Take classes you think you will enjoy, but also take classes you've never really heard of. College is all about experiencing new things, and Stockton definitely gives every student that opportunity. Bang for the buck
